name: expenseowl
description: ExpenseOwl is a personal expense tracker that lets users record daily spending, categorize expenses, and view visual summaries. It aims to be easy to self-host and mobile-friendly so finances can be tracked privately.
features: Expense Tracking: Record daily spending quickly. Simple financial logging.
Category Organization: Group expenses for better insights. Understand spending patterns.
Visual Summaries: Charts and graphs of your finances. Clear financial picture.
Mobile-Friendly: Track expenses on any device. Manage money anywhere.
Private Finance: Keep spending data on your server. Complete financial privacy.
Self-Hosted: Own your expense tracker completely. Your money, your data.
